title: Sports facilities
content: How is sports facilities at rr and ec campus? I'm a casual player nothing fancy and my friend at rr campus is saying their badminton courts are very crowded. Is that true?

comments.body: They have almost all sports at GJB , and they're all free to use ( except the gym). Altho u'll need to manage time and sometimes courts are crowded for sure
GJB? And is this in rr or ec
